## Correlations

One of the few methods that are commonly done are correlations. 
There are several implementations and variants. 
I will look at some I found and compare slightly.


## Implementations

```{r eval = FALSE}
stats::cor
WGCNA::cor # 104 dependencies
miRcomb::cor
coop::pcor # see the vignette for more references
HiClimR::fastCor
```
